com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.groups

Interface IGroup

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DistributedGroup

    public interface IGroup
    Distributed group, composed of group members that all have a role.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addConfigurationMismatchListener(IConfigurationMismatchListener configurationMismatchListener)
      Registers a listener for configuration mismatch events within the group between a primary and a secondary.

      Registers a listener for group change events.
      void addServiceConfigurationMismatchListener(IServiceConfigurationMismatchListener configurationMismatchListener)
      Registers a listener for service configuration mismatch events within the group between a primary and a secondary.

      Changes the role of a group member.

      long getPublishingPeriod()

      Tells whether the given group member has joined this IGroup.

    • Method Detail

      • join

        void join(GroupMember member,
          GroupMemberRole role)
   throws IllegalArgumentException
        Adds the given member to the group.
        Parameters:
        member - the group member to add
        role - the group member's current role
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if member is already a member of this group

      • changeRole

        void changeRole(GroupMember member,
                GroupMemberRole role)
         throws IllegalArgumentException
        Changes the role of a group member.
        Parameters:
        member - the group member whose role has changed
        role - the group member's new role. Using a role that is equal to the group member's current role has no effect
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if member is not a member of this group

      • leave

        void leave(GroupMember member)
    throws IllegalArgumentException
        Removes the given member from the group.
        Parameters:
        member - the group member to remove
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if member is not a member of this group

      • isJoinedMember

        boolean isJoinedMember(GroupMember member)
        Tells whether the given group member has joined this IGroup.
        Parameters:
        member - a group member
        Returns:
        true if. this member has joined this group

      • addGroupChangeListener

        void addGroupChangeListener(IGroupChangeListener groupChangeListener)
                     throws IllegalArgumentException
        Registers a listener for group change events. Such events take the form of a new group snapshot, composed of group members and roles.
        Parameters:
        groupChangeListener - the listener to register
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if listener is already registered

      • removeGroupChangeListener

        void removeGroupChangeListener(IGroupChangeListener groupChangeListener)
                        throws IllegalArgumentException
        Unregisters a listener for group change events.
        Parameters:
        groupChangeListener - the listener to unregister
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if listener is not registered

      • getPublishingPeriod

        long getPublishingPeriod()
        Returns:
        the group's publishing period, expressed in milliseconds

      • getAgeThreshold

        int getAgeThreshold()
        Returns:
        the group's age threshold, expressed in number of publishing periods

      • addConfigurationMismatchListener

        void addConfigurationMismatchListener(IConfigurationMismatchListener configurationMismatchListener)
        Registers a listener for configuration mismatch events within the group between a primary and a secondary.
        Parameters:
        configurationMismatchListener - a listener for configuration mismatch events

      • removeConfigurationMismatchListener

        void removeConfigurationMismatchListener(IConfigurationMismatchListener configurationMismatchListener)
        Unregisters a listener for configuration mismatch events.
        Parameters:
        configurationMismatchListener - a listener for configuration mismatch events

      • addServiceConfigurationMismatchListener

        void addServiceConfigurationMismatchListener(IServiceConfigurationMismatchListener configurationMismatchListener)
        Registers a listener for service configuration mismatch events within the group between a primary and a secondary.
        Parameters:
        configurationMismatchListener - a listener for service configuration mismatch events

      • removeServiceConfigurationMismatchListener

        void removeServiceConfigurationMismatchListener(IServiceConfigurationMismatchListener configurationMismatchListener)
        Unregisters a listener for service configuration mismatch events.
        Parameters:
        configurationMismatchListener - a listener for service configuration mismatch events
